mobiles.name: oldstyle knight ethereal dark
mobiles.long_description: A dark ethereal knight hovers over the bloody clearing.
mobiles.description:
The ethereal knight is clad in shadowy black armor. It appears as though he
was involved in the carnage that occurred here. His soul is trapped here, as
he waits for release.

mobiles.name: oldstyle treant tree
mobiles.long_description: A huge, gnarled tree stands here, battered by age and nature.
mobiles.description:
The old tree looks as though the wind has battered and torn at it for years.
Very few leaves remain. Its limbs are crooked and gnarled. It moans as the 
wind pushes it back and forth.

mobiles.name: oldstyle dweller cave creature
mobiles.long_description: A slimy, gross creature is here munching on a corpse.
mobiles.description:
The cave dweller looks like a mixture of several disgusting monsters. It has
a bird's beak, huge white eyes, a furry body, and long clawed hands and feet.
It sees you and snarls.

mobiles.name: oldstyle toad rock
mobiles.long_description: A rather large rock toad sits here, croaking loudly.
mobiles.description: A grey toad. Its about the size of a cow. Small horns grow all over its body.

mobiles.name: oldstyle weeping willow tree
mobiles.long_description: A large willow tree stands here, weeping.
mobiles.description:
The weeping willow has long thins branches. These branches seem to droop in
anguish and dismay. You hear a faint sound of crying.

mobiles.name: oldstyle mist mistling
mobiles.long_description: A mistling emerges from the mist surrounding you.
mobiles.description: It looks like a thin wisp of mist that has gained substance and size.

mobiles.name: oldstyle swamp wraith
mobiles.long_description: A swamp wraith emerges from the mist here.
mobiles.description:
The swamp wraith is made of mist and is in the image of a great warrior. He
appears to emerge from the mist. You feel the cold radiating from his form as
he nears you.

mobiles.name: oldstyle ogre villager
mobiles.long_description: The ogre villager is here, going about its chores.
mobiles.description:
You see a pitifully overworked ogre. It is dressed in rags and shuffles along
with its head hung low. It sees you and cringes in mortal terror.

mobiles.name: oldstyle warrior ogre
mobiles.long_description: The ogre warrior stands here, growling fiercely.
mobiles.description:
The ogre warrior is dressed in thick fur armor. He looks quite large and
formidable.

mobiles.name: oldstyle guard ogre
mobiles.long_description: The ogre guard is here manning his post faithfully.
mobiles.description:
The ogre guard stands here manning his post. It appears as though he would
fight to the death before abandoning his post.

mobiles.name: oldstyle shaman ogre
mobiles.long_description: The ogre shaman is here chanting arcane words and waving his arms.
mobiles.description:
The ogre shaman is draped in thick fur cloaks and pelts. He has all types of
charms and holy symbols draped about him. He looks at you and snarls.

mobiles.name: oldstyle chief chieftain ogre
mobiles.long_description: The ogre chieftain is here, observing his subjects.
mobiles.description:
This is the biggest ogre you have ever seen. He is heavily equipped and looks
quite formidable. He towers high above you and growls menacingly.

mobiles.name: oldstyle barbarian
mobiles.long_description: A plains barbarian is here, clad in heavy furs.
mobiles.description:
The plains barbarian is clad in heavy furs. He seems used to the chilling cold
and icy wastes.

mobiles.name: oldstyle yeti white
mobiles.long_description: The white yeti crouches here snarling.
mobiles.description:
The white yeti looks like a huge white snow ape. Its long arms end in long
curved talons and its mouth is full of sharp teeth.

mobiles.name: oldstyle worm ice iceworm
mobiles.long_description:
A huge ice worm burrows through the ice and snow here. It rears up and
attacks!
mobiles.description:
The huge worm is almost 50 feet long. Its huge gaping mouth spews ice and snow
as it charges directly at you.

mobiles.name: oldstyle citizen minotaur
mobiles.long_description: A minotaur citizen is here, hurrying through the icy streets.
mobiles.description:
You see a rather ragged and cold minotaur. It appears to be looking for a warm
place to seek refuge from the cold.

mobiles.name: oldstyle guard minotaur
mobiles.long_description: A minotaur guard catches you trespassing and attacks!
mobiles.description:
The minotaur is clad in heavy furs. Beneath these furs, you see the gleam of
his armor.

mobiles.name: oldstyle warrior minotaur
mobiles.long_description: A minotaur warrior is here looking for intruders.
mobiles.description:
You see a huge minotaur that is dressed in thick furs and armor. He has black
fur and red eyes. He looks quite capable of protecting the city.

mobiles.name: oldstyle minotaur gatekeeper
mobiles.long_description: A minotaur is here guarding the Keep of Mahn-Tor.
mobiles.description:
The minotaur stands rigidly before the gates of the keep. It looks quite
miserable standing in the driven snow and ice.

mobiles.name: oldstyle minotaur high guard
mobiles.long_description: The minotaur high guard is here guarding the Keep.
mobiles.description:
The high guard is dressed in blue plate armour. He looks quite dangerous and
skilled.

mobiles.name: oldstyle minotaur royal guard
mobiles.long_description: The royal minotaur guard considers you an intruder and attacks!
mobiles.description:
The royal guard is quite huge. He is dressed in heavy red armor and wields a
huge glaive. He looks quite capable of protecting the keep.

mobiles.name: oldstyle guard minotaur elite
mobiles.long_description: The elite minotaur guard sees you and attacks!
mobiles.description:
This minotaur wields a huge morningstar and is clad in heavy crimson plate and
furs.

mobiles.name: oldstyle girl haremgirl harem slave
mobiles.long_description: A harem girl cowers here in fear.
mobiles.description:
She looks quite attractive. Her low cut gown reveals why she was chosen to be
in the harem.

mobiles.name: oldstyle butler minotaur
mobiles.long_description: A minotaur butler stands here rigidly, awaiting orders.
mobiles.description: He looks quite regal and refined to be a minotaur.

mobiles.name: oldstyle keeper minotaur ring-keeper
mobiles.long_description: The minotaur ring-keeper stands guarding his post.
mobiles.description:
The ring-keeper is a huge minotaur. You notice a huge ring of multicolored
keys hanging from his belt. He wears huge, spiked brass knuckles.

mobiles.name: oldstyle gorak minotaur warrior master
mobiles.long_description: Gorak, the Minotaur Master Warrior, is here practicing his skills.
mobiles.description:
Gorak is HUGE. His bulging muscles are confined beneath heavy armor. He is the
master of the warrior guild of Mahn-Tor.

mobiles.name: oldstyle darkoth minotaur anti-paladin master
mobiles.long_description: Darkoth, the minotaur anti-paladin, stands here grinning wickedly.
mobiles.description:
Darkoth is a living incarnation of evil. He radiates a dark aura, and a cold
chill runs down your spine. He is the master of the Mahn-Tor anti-paladins.

mobiles.name: oldstyle tyrgoth minotaur paladin master
mobiles.long_description: Tyrgoth, the minotaur paladin, is here worshipping silently.
mobiles.description:
Tyrgoth is the minotaur incarnation of good. You feel safe and at ease in his
presence. He is the leader of the Mahn-Tor paladins.

mobiles.name: oldstyle amyrok minotaur mage master
mobiles.long_description: Amyrok, the minotaur archmage, is here chanting arcane spells.
mobiles.description:
Amyrok is a small minotaur. He is clad in loose robes and emits an aura of
power. He appears quite dangerous, despite his size. He is the leader of the
mages of Mahn-Tor.

mobiles.name: oldstyle sumaron minotaur cleric master
mobiles.long_description: Sumaron, master cleric of Mahn-Tor, is here looking holy.
mobiles.description:
Sumaron is clad in white glowing robes. He is goodness incarnate. He is the
master of all the clerics of Mahn-Tor.

mobiles.name: oldstyle nasturn minotaur druid master
mobiles.long_description: Nasturn, the minotaur druid, is here studying the arts of nature.
mobiles.description:
Nasturn is quite a natural looking minotaur. He is dressed in leather and
wears no metal of any type. He looks at you and smiles.

mobiles.name: oldstyle belrak minotaur ranger master
mobiles.long_description: Belrak, the minotaur ranger, looks unhappy about having visitors.
mobiles.description:
Belrak is clad in green and brown leather. He looks quite agile and thin, when
compared to the normal minotaur. He looks at you with a slight smirk.

mobiles.name: oldstyle dorgar minotaur thief master
mobiles.long_description: Dorgar, the minotaur thief, is here hiding in the shadows.
mobiles.description:
Dorgar is clad all in black. He is tall and slender, unlike most minotaurs. He
appears to be quite a skilled thief.

mobiles.name: oldstyle mahn-tor minotaur grand master
mobiles.long_description: Mahn-Tor, the minotaur grand master, is here looking down at you.
mobiles.description:
Mahn-Tor towers above you. He is simply huge. Mahn-Tor is clad in the best of
armor and robes. He wields the largest axe you have ever seen. You can see why
Mahn-Tor is the leader of the minotaurs. He is awe-inspiring.

objects.name: gloves combat
objects.short_description: a pair of minotaur combat gloves
objects.description: A pair of metal plated gloves lie here.

extra_descriptions.description:
These gloves are plated with metal plates that provide strength and 
protection.

objects.name: spiked armor garde
objects.short_description: a suit of spiked garde armor
objects.description: A pile of spiked chainmail lies here.

objects.name: greaves black
objects.short_description: a pair of black minotaur greaves
objects.description: Some black metal greaves lie here.

objects.name: vambraces black
objects.short_description: a pair of black minotaur vambraces
objects.description: Some black metal vambraces lie here.

objects.name: rod weaponry
objects.description: A shiny metal rod lies here.

objects.name: cloak pitch black
objects.description: A pile of black cloth lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: It appears to have pockets inside it.

objects.name: neckguard neck guard black plate
objects.description: A black plate collar rests here.

objects.name: spiked gauntlets
objects.description: A pair of spiked gauntlets lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: They look pretty damaging.

objects.name: shield shadow
objects.description: A shadowy shield rests here.

extra_descriptions.description: You look into the depths of the shield and shiver at the evil it contains.

objects.name: nightbringer short sword shortsword
objects.description: A very evil looking shortsword lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: The runes "NiGHtBrINgeR" are scrawled along the blade.

objects.name: visor helm golden
objects.description: A helm and visor made of pure gold rests here.

objects.name: breast plate gilded gold
objects.description: A large golden breast plate lies here.

objects.name: cape white billowing silk
objects.description: A pile of white silk lies here.

objects.name: shield huge tower
objects.description: A huge shield lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: A pure white shield with a gold cross emblazoned across it.

objects.name: dawnbringer mace huge two-handed
objects.description: A huge mace lies here. It radiates an aura of power.

extra_descriptions.description: The runes "DAwNbRIngER" are scrawled along the handle.

objects.name: spectacles wire rimmed
objects.short_description: a pair of wire rimmed spectacles
objects.description: A small pair of wire rimmed spectacles rests here.

extra_descriptions.description: They'll make you look smart.

objects.name: ring banded
objects.description: A small ring made of gold and silver bands lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: The ring has entwined bands of gold and silver.

objects.name: globe minor
objects.description: A small globe rests here. It shimmers and radiates power.

extra_descriptions.description: Shimmering colors move inside the globe.

objects.name: staff gnarled magius
objects.description: A gnarled staff lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: It appears to be simply a gnarled old limb. It feels powerful though.

objects.name: girdle pouches many
objects.description: A girdle lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: It appears to be full of tiny pockets.

objects.name: robe heavy woolen
objects.description: A heavy pile of wool lies here.

objects.name: brooch ivory
objects.description: A small ivory brooch lies here.

objects.name: manual arts healing book
objects.description: A small book lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: It appears to be a book of anatomy and medicine.

objects.name: mace huge mithril
objects.description: A huge mace made of mithril metal lies here.

objects.name: symbol holy golden
objects.description: A small holy symbol on a golden chain lies here.

objects.name: ring marble thick
objects.description: A thick ring made of marble

objects.name: bracelet thick marble
objects.description: A thick bracelet made of marble lies here.

objects.name: boots striding
objects.description: A lithe pair of leather boots have been left here.

extra_descriptions.description: They look comfortable to walk in.

objects.name: cloak icy white
objects.description: A cold pile of white cloth lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: Smoke rises from it almost like it's made of dry ice.

objects.name: staff ice
objects.description: A staff made of ice rests here.

extra_descriptions.description: The runes "FrIgID" are inscribed in the icy staff.

objects.name: ring carved wooden
objects.description: A wooden ring is on the floor.

objects.name: horn life
objects.description: A severed minotaur horn lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: The horn is capped at both ends with gold. Unreadable runes are scrawled on it.

objects.name: belt life
objects.description: A strange belt lies here.

objects.name: stone blood red
objects.description: A blood red stone lies here collecting dust.

extra_descriptions.description: The stone pulses with your own heart beat.

objects.name: crossbow huge
objects.description: A huge crossbow rests here.

objects.name: pack leather small
objects.description: A small leather pack rests here.

extra_descriptions.description: It looks pretty big on the inside.

objects.name: hood black leather
objects.description: A hood made of black leather rests here.

objects.name: sleeves black leather
objects.short_description: a pair of black leather sleeves
objects.description: Some leather sleeves lie here.

objects.name: pants black leather
objects.short_description: a pair of black leather pants
objects.description: Some leather pants lie here.

extra_descriptions.description: They look sneaky.

objects.name: sword wicked short shortsword
objects.description: A wicked looking shortsword lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: It looks just perfect for backstabbing.

objects.name: globe major
objects.description: A large globe rests here, pulsing uneasily.

extra_descriptions.description: Shimmering colors move inside the globe.

objects.name: chain chainmail black suit
objects.short_description: a suit of black minotaur chainmail
objects.description: A huge pile of black chainmail rests here.

objects.name: buckler spiked
objects.description: A small spiked buckler rests here.

objects.name: ring studded
objects.description: A small studded ring lies here.

objects.name: helm horned
objects.description: A small horned helm rests here.

objects.name: axe great
objects.description: An extremely huge axe is resting here.

extra_descriptions.description: The runes "DeAtH" are scrawled along the blade.

objects.name: plate ethereal suit
objects.description: A suit of shimmering plate rests here.

extra_descriptions.description: You can almost see through it.

objects.name: helm ethereal
objects.description: A shimmering helm rests here.

extra_descriptions.description: You can almost see through it.

objects.name: blade ethereal
objects.description: A shimmering blade lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: You can almost see through it.

objects.name: branch willow
objects.description: A small willow branch lies here.

objects.name: key keep
objects.description: A small key lies here.

objects.name: key red
objects.description: A small red key lies here.

objects.name: key black
objects.description: A small black key lies here.

objects.name: key white
objects.description: A small white key lies here.

objects.name: key brown
objects.description: A small brown key lies here.

objects.name: key yellow
objects.description: A small yellow key lies here.

objects.name: key maroon
objects.description: A small maroon key lies here.

objects.name: key green
objects.description: A small green key lies here.

objects.name: key grey
objects.description: A small grey key lies here.

objects.name: key runed
objects.description: A small runed key lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: The key looks like it was made for royalty.

objects.name: boots fur lined
objects.short_description: a pair of fur lined boots
objects.description: A pair of boots are on the floor.

objects.name: pelt yeti white
objects.short_description: the white pelt of a yeti
objects.description: A white pelt lies here.

objects.name: sword kopesh
objects.description: A sword with a curved blade lies here.

extra_descriptions.description:
The sword looks like it would be grasped so that the blade extended along the
forearm of the wielder.

objects.name: vambraces steel
objects.description: A gleaming pair of vambraces lies here.

objects.name: greaves steel
objects.description: A gleaming pair of greaves lie here.

objects.name: axe battle battleaxe
objects.description: A dangerous looking battle axe rests here.

objects.name: plate steel breast
objects.description: A breast plate of thick steel rests here.

objects.name: helm steel
objects.description: A steel helm has been left here.

objects.name: halberd huge two-handed
objects.description: A huge halberd has been left here.

objects.name: visor blue steel helm
objects.short_description: a blue steel helm and visor
objects.description: A helm and visor of blue steel rests here.

objects.name: greaves blue steel
objects.short_description: a pair of blue steel greaves
objects.description: Some greaves made of blue steel rest here.

objects.name: vambraces blue steel
objects.short_description: a pair of blue steel vambraces
objects.description: Some vambraces made of blue steel rest here.

objects.name: sword two two-handed
objects.description: A large sword lies here.

objects.name: visor helm steel red
objects.short_description: a red steel helm and visor
objects.description: A helm and visor made of red steel rests here.

objects.name: greaves red steel
objects.short_description: a pair of red steel greaves
objects.description: Some greaves made of red steel rest here.

objects.name: vambraces red steel
objects.short_description: a pair of red steel vambraces
objects.description: Some vambraces made of red steel rest here.

objects.name: glaive
objects.description: A very large glaive rests here.

objects.name: visor helm crimson steel
objects.short_description: a crimson steel helm and visor
objects.description: A helm and visor made of crimson steel rests here.

objects.name: greaves crimson steel
objects.short_description: a pair of crimson steel greaves
objects.description: Some greaves made of crimson steel rest here.

objects.name: vambraces crimson steel
objects.short_description: a pair of crimson steel vambraces
objects.description: Some vambraces made of crimson steel rest here.

objects.name: star morning morningstar
objects.description: A huge morningstar rests here.

extra_descriptions.description: It looks damaging.

objects.name: spiked brass knuckles
objects.description: A set of spiked brass knuckles lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: A band held in the hand that has spikes on the front side.

objects.name: ring key multi colored multi-colored
objects.description: A ring of multi-colored keys rests here.

extra_descriptions.description: It has several keys of different colors on it.

objects.name: maul huge wooden
objects.description: A huge wooden maul rests here.

objects.name: potion misty
objects.description: A small misty potion rests here.

objects.name: pouch belt
objects.description: A belt pouch lies here.

objects.name: spear ogre
objects.description: A crude spear rests here.

objects.name: club ogre war
objects.description: A large, crude club rests here.

objects.name: cloak bear skin bearskin
objects.description: A rough bearskin rests here.

objects.name: ear ring earring feathered
objects.description: Some feathered earrings rest here.

objects.name: gauntlets ogre power
objects.description: Some heavy gauntlets lie here.

extra_descriptions.description: They look very "handy".

objects.name: club massive
objects.description: A massive club lies here, discarded.

objects.name: cape thick fur
objects.description: A thick pile of fur lies here.

objects.name: tunic fur lined
objects.description: A fur lined tunic rests here.

rooms.name: The dark woods
rooms.description:
You are travelling through woods that are as dark as night. The trees above
block all light and wind. The air is stagnant and smells of death and decay.
The lack of sounds and other signs of life make your skin crawl and you feel
very much like turning back and heading for safer areas. The path leads north
into more open lands while it also leads south into the darkness of the forest.
A small sign is posted here.

extra_descriptions.description:
[]================================[]
     |      BEWARE!      | Hope you   |
     |   Travellers are  | enjoy it!  |
     |  advised to stay  | <------->  |
     |   in groups for   |  Skurge    |
     |      safety.      | Ragnarok   |
    []================================[]

rooms.name: The dark woods
rooms.description:
You wearily travel through the darkness of the forest. Huge skeletal trees
line the edges of the path and tower above you. Errant rays of light spear
down through the gaps in the canopy above and provide small spots of light
that seem to attract what little foliage can grow on the dark forest floor.
The path winds north and south into darkness.

rooms.name: The small intersection in the forest
rooms.description:
The forest path splits here in three directions. Small paths lead to the east,
north, and south. The trees above leave a gap which allows light to fill the
intersection. It is almost as though you are in a circle of light that
provides sanctuary in this land of darkness.
Something has been scrawled in the dirt in blood here.

extra_descriptions.description: BeWAre tHe SwAmP oGreS......

rooms.name: The edge of the forest and hills
rooms.description:
You stand at the edge of a dark forest. A path leads north into the forest and
its deadly darkness and silence. Looking west, you see a path that leads up
into a foothills region. Standing here on the boundary between light and
darkness, you feel very vulnerable and alone.

rooms.name: In the dense forest
rooms.description:
You walk along a small path leading through a dark forest. No sounds can be
heard and little light penetrates the canopy of trees above you. The air here
smells musty and you long for a fresh breath. You see an intersection of paths
to the west. The path you are on leads south into the darkening woods.

rooms.name: The dark forest path
rooms.description:
You continue on through darkness and gloom. The path below you has become a
wet quagmire. It is difficult to walk, and you make squishing sounds as you
move on. Looking east, you see a swampy path. The main path leads north and
south into darkness.

rooms.name: A turn in the path
rooms.description:
The forest path turns here towards the north and west. To the north, you see
that the ground has become dank and swampy, while the western path appears
to be entering a hilly area. You hear sounds of swamp creatures to the north
east.

rooms.name: The bloody intersection
rooms.description:
This is a small intersection. Paths lead east, west, and south. You are struck
by the carnage here when you enter the clearing. There appears to have been a
great battle here. Blood is everywhere and the ground is all torn up. Pieces
of beaten armour and broken blades lie all around. Examining the tracks here
lead you to believe that the dead and wounded were dragged off in two 
directions, south and east.

rooms.name: The rocky path
rooms.description:
The path here winds among the low rocky hills. The long trek up and down the
hills begins to tire you greatly. Looking east, you see a small clearing. More
hills are to the north of here.

rooms.name: The rocky path
rooms.description:
The path here is very rocky and treacherous. The travelling is rough and you
slip and fall often. Looking south, you see that the path continues into the
hills. Smoother ground is to the east, but the path seems to lead into a dark
forest in that direction.

rooms.name: Up the rocky hillside
rooms.description:
You are climbing on a rocky hillside. As you scramble about, loose rocks and
small boulders bounce and fall down below you. Looking to the east and west,
you see more stable ground. The hillside itself goes on higher to the south
and it drops away to the north.

rooms.name: The sparse foothills
rooms.description:
You are in foothills that are sparsely covered by scraggly bushes and weather
beaten trees. There are little signs of life here. Only bare rock and dry dirt
can be seen. Looking east, you see a small pass that will allow you to leave
the foothills. The foothills themselves extend to the south.

rooms.name: Standing on level ground
rooms.description:
You are standing at the edge of a steep set of foothills. Looking down, you
see what appears to be a marshy, dark forest. It reeks of death and decay.
Even here, you catch its scent on the winds. From here, you can travel south
deeper into the foothills or to the west where a small pass will allow you to
climb down.

rooms.name: In the foothills
rooms.description:
You are in a barren set of foothills. Looking around, all you see are dead
plants and boulders. From the south, you get a whiff of salty air. Barren paths
lead east, north, and south into more barren hills.

rooms.name: Before the huge tree
rooms.description:
You enter a large ring of boulders. Sheltered by this wall of stones, a small
cluster of plants have sprung up. In the center of this group of trees and
bushes is a huge gnarled tree. It appears to have been twisted and torn by
the forces of nature. It sways and moans as a strong wind from the south tears
through its old feeble branches. The hills themselves lead in all directions.

rooms.name: Before the dark cave
rooms.description:
You stand directly before a huge dark cave. The rocks and boulders outside the
cave are covered with blood stains and all types of broken and shattered bones
lie around. An unbearable stench comes from within the cave itself. The dark
cave entrance looms to the east. The hills themselves lead towards the
north, south, and west.

rooms.name: Inside the horrid cave
rooms.description:
The stench is overwhelming. You can hardly breathe as you enter the cave.
Looking around, you realize that some bizarre and horrible creature uses this
cave as a home. Skeletal remains lie all over. Several half-eaten corpses are
rotting away slowly in the gloomy darkness. In the back of the cave, you see a
large pile of rotting cloth, fur, and plant matter. Light and safety is
towards the west.

extra_descriptions.description: It appears to be some sort of nest......

rooms.name: The hills overlooking the shore
rooms.description:
Standing at the edge of the foothills, you are able to look down upon a rocky
shoreline. It appears as though a vast ocean is to the south. Sea birds have
made their nests here in the rocks and you are heartened by the presence of
life here. It is possible to climb down to the shore here. The hills
themselves are to the north. The edge of the hills leads to the east along the
shoreline.

rooms.name: The hills overlooking the shoreline
rooms.description:
You stand on a barren section of hills that overlook a rocky shoreline. The
stiff ocean wind has blown the rocks smooth here and you have to lean forward
a bit to keep your balance. The salty sea air fills your nostrils and you
notice signs of life in the rocky crags here. You can climb down towards the
shore or head north into the hills themselves. The rocky summit you are
standing leads east and west along the shoreline.

rooms.name: The hills above the shoreline
rooms.description:
You stand on a rocky summit overlooking a rough shoreline below. The sea wind
blows hard across the rocks here and they have been worn smooth with time.
Looking around, you notice that you can safely climb down towards the shore.
The hills themselves stretch towards the north. The rough summit you stand
upon leads west along the shoreline.

rooms.name: The rocky shore
rooms.description:
You are at the base of the rocky hills. Stretching to the south and east, you
see a rocky shore. To the southeast, you see a small altar of some sorts that
glows with an eerie blue light. It is possible to climb up into the hills here.

rooms.name: The rocky shoreline
rooms.description:
You are on a rocky shore that borders a vast sea. A stiff wind blows here and
whistles among the rocks. You see an altar of some sort built on the shore to
the south. The shore itself leads east and west. Looking up, you see foothills
and rocky crags.

rooms.name: The rocky shore
rooms.description:
You stand at the base of some rocky hills, where they meet a rocky shore. A
vast sea is to your south. Looking to the southwest, you see a small altar
that glows with a eerie blue light. The shore stretches out to the south and
west. It is possible to climb up into the hills here.

rooms.name: The edge of the sea
rooms.description:
You walk along the water's edge. The vastness of the ocean is staggering as
you look out across it. You notice a small altar that glows with blue light
to the east. The shore itself extends north away from the water's edge.

rooms.name: The Blood Sea Portal
rooms.description:
You stand on a small pedestal like altar that has been built on the shore 
here. Standing here, you can look out across the sea. You can almost imagine
that you see a far away island. Dominating the altar is a small blue portal of
light. It is possible to walk south into the portal. The shore itself extends
to the north, east, and west.
There are small inscriptions on the rock at the base of the portal.

extra_descriptions.description:
You see a swirling blue portal of light. You think you can see glimpses of
something moving on the "other side".
"Enter all ye who wish to join the Brotherhood!"

rooms.name: The edge of the sea
rooms.description:
You walk along the water's edge. The tide appears to have risen. Very little
debris is washed up on shore. You slip and slide as you tread across the
slippery rocks that make up the shore. To the west you see a small altar that
radiates blue light. The shore extends north away from the water's edge.

rooms.name: Floating in blue light
rooms.description:
You seem to be floating in blue weightlessness. You tumble head over heels and
finally right yourself. Gaining your bearings, you notice that there are two
"windows" in the sea of blue here. One to the south shows an image of a snowy
plain. Another window the the north shows an image of a rocky shore.

rooms.name: The swampy path
rooms.description:
This damp path seems to lead into a deep, dark swamp. The trees above block
out all light and stifle the wind. You smell swamp gas and hear damp squashing
sounds all around you. The path leads east deeper into the swamp. You also see
a dark forest to the west.

rooms.name: The swampy path
rooms.description:
You tread lightly in a wet, swampy path. All around you, you see pools of
quicksand and rotting vegetation. Unlike the forest to the west, the swamp is
teeming with life. Some of it is harmless, some is not. The path leads east
and west into more swamp.

rooms.name: The swampy path
rooms.description:
You weave your way through the treacherous swamp. Gas rises all around you and
a damp mist covers the ground, making it impossible to travel safely, without
carefully picking your way around obstacles. Large, gnarled trees rise above
you. Their moss covered branches block out all traces of the sun. The path
here leads east and west.

rooms.name: The turn in the swampy path
rooms.description:
You come upon a bend in the swampy path. The ground here is fairly sturdy,
as this place is elevated above the rest of the swamp. Looking around, you see
a dark, mist filled swamp. Small paths lead south and west into the mist.

rooms.name: The swampy path
rooms.description:
You tread lightly through the mirky water and sludge that makes up the path
you follow. To the east, there is a thick wall of mist. You can see nothing
within it. Harder ground rises to the north.

rooms.name: Lost in the Mist
rooms.description:
You wander, hopelessly lost. Swirling mist obscures your vision and clouds
your mind. You lose all concept of direction. Small, silent giggles can be
heard all around. You can wander in any direction.

rooms.name: Lost in the Mist
rooms.description:
You are in a thick misty area. The mist swirls around you, seeming to taunt
you and dare you to escape. You feel a slight electric charge in the mist. It
almost caresses your body as it floats about you. You can wander in any
direction.......

rooms.name: Lost in the Mist
rooms.description:
You try to peer through the mist......You see nothing. It swirls about you,
covering you in a damp sheen. There is no sound, all light is eagerly devoured
by the mist. You feel totally and hopelessly lost.

rooms.name: Lost in the Mist
rooms.description:
You stumble through the marsh here. The swamp seems to have swallowed you up
and denied you exit. This mist is your jailor. You cannot tell where you are.
You hear quiet laughter all about you.

rooms.name: Lost in the Mist
rooms.description:
You wander, lost, for what seems an eternity. Then....From nowhere....You see
what appears to be trees and hills to the east. The mist itself thickens to
the west, while it grows thin to the east.

rooms.name: Lost in the Mist
rooms.description:
You wander through the thick mist. It swirls all about you and makes it hard
to breathe. The ground below you makes a soft squishing sound as you trudge
on, but this noise is absorbed by the mist and does not travel. You can wander
in any direction.

rooms.name: Lost in the Mist
rooms.description:
You wander, lost hopelessly. The mist swirls all about you. You can discern no
direction. You stumble blindly through the mist, oblivious to your
surroundings.

rooms.name: The solid path
rooms.description:
A solid path rises out of the misty swamp. It leads north, into what appears
to be a forested area. The trees, above, allow light and air to penetrate and
you can see the sky above. A thick bank of mist is to your west.

rooms.name: A forested path
rooms.description:
The path here leads north through a thick forest. High bushes and forest
undergrowth line both sides of the trail. Looking north, you see a thin line
of smoke rising up above the tree line. You also notice a crude wooden gate
farther north on the trail. The trail itself leads south into murky territory.

rooms.name: The gate before the Ogre Village
rooms.description:
You stand before a huge pair of crude, wooden gates. They are thrown open.
Looking inside the gates, you see a crude village. Large humanoid creatures
are milling to and fro.......Ogres! You can head north through the gate or
south into the forest.

rooms.name: Among the crude huts
rooms.description:
You walk among the huts of the ogre village. The village appears to be cut
from the heart of the forest itself. The swamp, nearby, provides the ogres
with a prime hunting ground. Small paths lead north and east.

rooms.name: Inside the gates
rooms.description:
You stand just north of the gates to the village. Looking around, you see many
crude huts and cooking fires. To the north, you see a huge fire pit. Behind 
it, there appears to be a hut of sorts. Small paths lead east and west among 
the crude huts. The gates to the south provide an exit from the village.

rooms.name: Among the crude huts
rooms.description:
You walk through the crude village. Small huts made of wood and thatch
surround you. Every so often, you can hear grunts and snarls inside the huts.
The smell here is unbearable. You wonder what type of creature could possibly
live in such squalor. Small paths lead west and north here.

rooms.name: The gathering place
rooms.description:
This appears to be the clearing the ogres use to assemble. It is quite large
and has a raised mound in the center that contains a crude throne. The ground
in front of the throne is quite worn, as if it is sat on quite often. You get
the impression that this place is a crude sort of auditorium. Small paths lead
east and south.

rooms.name: The firepit before the lodge
rooms.description:
You stand at the edge of a huge firepit. The heat from the burning embers
makes you sweat as you stand here. Large spits above the pit are empty but
they appear to be quite large enough to hold hapless adventurers. A large
lodge is towards the north, while paths lead east, west, and south into the
village itself.

rooms.name: The village dump
rooms.description:
The smell here overpowers you. All around you are the rotting remains of the
village's refuse. Partially eaten corpses, rotting food, and other truly
disgusting things have been discarded here. Paths lead south and west towards
fresher air.

rooms.name: The entryway to the lodge
rooms.description:
You are at the entry hall to a large lodge. Animal pelts and other trophies
line the walls here. Large chests on either side of the door appear to be
locked. The lodge stretches north, while the doors to the south provide an
exit into the village.

rooms.name: The throne room
rooms.description:
You stand in a large, crudely decorated throne room. A huge throne adorned
with humanoid skulls sits against the west wall. A crude, blood stained altar
is against the east wall. A doorway is directly to the north, long strands of
beads blocking the view of the other side. Crude torches light the hall and 
smoke clings to the ceiling.

rooms.name: The chieftain's room
rooms.description:
This appears to be the ogre chieftain's private quarters. A huge pile of furs
is in the far corner. Large chests fill the room. All of them have heavy pad
locks. The room is filled with trophies of dead enemies. It is quite lavishly
decorated for such a crude inhabitant as an ogre. A beaded doorway is to the
south.

rooms.name: The frigid wastelands
rooms.description:
You wander through the frigid wastelands. Your breath is a cloud before you.
The cold cuts to the bone. Swirling snow and wind make impossible for you to
discern any directions.

rooms.name: The frigid wastelands
rooms.description:
You wander through the frigid wastelands. Your breath is a cloud before you.
The cold cuts to the bone. Swirling snow and wind make it impossible to
discern any directions.

rooms.name: The Glacier Temple
rooms.description:
You are in a small temple. It appears to be built entirely from ice. The ice
walls are frosted and are opaque. There is a small blue portal here. You can
go north, to enter the portal. Looking south, you see a world of white outside
the open doorway. Swirling snow and bright light obscure your view.

rooms.name: The frigid wastelands
rooms.description:
You wander through the frigid wastelands. Your breath is a cloud before you.
The cold cuts to the bone. Swirling snow and wind make it impossible for you
to discern any directions.

rooms.name: The frigid wastelands
rooms.description:
You wander through the frigid wastelands. Your breath is a cloud before you.
The cold cuts to the bone. Swirling snow and wind make it impossible for you
to discern any directions.

rooms.name: The frigid wastelands
rooms.description:
You wander through the frigid wastelands. Your breath is a cloud before you.
The cold cuts to the bone. Swirling snow and wind make it impossible for you
to discern any directions.

rooms.name: The frigid wastelands
rooms.description:
You wander through the frigid wastelands. Your breath is a cloud before you.
The cold cuts to the bone. Swirling snow and wind make it impossible for you
to discern any directions.

rooms.name: The frigid wastelands
rooms.description:
You wander through the frigid wastelands. Your breath is a cloud before you.
The cold cuts to the bone. Swirling snow and wind make it impossible for you
to discern any direction.

rooms.name: The frigid wastelands
rooms.description:
You wander through the frigid wastelands. Your breath is a cloud before you.
The cold cuts to the bone. Swirling snow and wind make it impossible for you
to discern any directions.

rooms.name: The edge of the frigid wastes
rooms.description:
You stand at the base of a steep rocky cliff. To the north, a vast arctic
wasteland stretches out. The snow falls lightly here and the wind is not
very fierce. You can climb up the rocky cliff or head north into the arctic
wastes.

rooms.name: On the cliffside
rooms.description:
You cling to the side of the cliff. Looking down, you are terrified by the
sheer distance to the ground below. You can climb up higher into the cliffs,
but the area above is obscured by clouds and you cannot tell what lies waiting
above.

rooms.name: Before the gates of Mahn-Tor
rooms.description:
You stand at the edge of a high cliff. Directly south, set back off the
cliff's edge, you see a huge pair of gates. These gates appear to be carved
almost completely out of ice. A huge city and keep appear to be on the other
side of these gates. There is also a possibility of climbing down the cliff 
face.

extra_descriptions.description:
The gates to the city are made almost completely of ice. Looking closely, you
can see intricate carvings in the gates. They appear to be of creatures that
are half man and half bull.

rooms.name: The city streets of Mahn-Tor
rooms.description:
You walk among the ice and snow covered shops and homes. Most of the doors are
closed and only the light from the windows betrays the presence of inhabitants.
A cold wind blows through here, scattering fine clouds of snow all about. Small
streets lead south and east.

rooms.name: Inside the gates of Mahn-Tor
rooms.description:
You stand just inside the gates to the city of Mahn-Tor. The city itself
spreads out in front of you. The buildings are sturdy, as they appear to be
made from the very rock of this mountain. Snow falls all around and a fine
sheet of ice can be seen covering all but the most used walk ways. Small city
streets lead east and west, while a main road appears to lead south.

rooms.name: The city streets of Mahn-Tor
rooms.description:
You trudge among the icy streets of Mahn-Tor. The streets themselves are made
of cobblestone and are quite treacherous. Small homes and businesses along
the street are closed tight and light from their windows throws eerie shadows
across the dark street. Small streets lead west and south here.

rooms.name: The city streets of Mahn-Tor
rooms.description:
You trudge through the snow covered streets. The street itself is made of
cobblestones and the footing is quite treacherous. To the south, you see what
appears to be a small tavern. Bright lights shine through the windows. Small
streets also lead north and east.
A small sign hangs outside the tavern.

rooms.name: The Square of Mahn-Tor
rooms.description:
This appears to be the main square of Mahn-Tor. A huge fountain graces the
center of the square, but the extreme cold has turned it into an ice
sculpture. The water has frozen in arcs through the air. Snow and ice covers
the square and small streets lead east and west. To the north, you see
the gates to the city. You also notice a small store to the south.
A small sign hangs outside the store.

rooms.name: The streets of Mahn-Tor
rooms.description:
You walk among the small stores and homes of Mahn-Tor. The cobblestone streets
are covered with ice and snow. Small snow drifts have formed at the edges of
the streets. The wind blows fiercely. Small streets lead in all directions.
There appears to be a large building to the east, but the snow obscures your
view.

rooms.name: The Inn of the Broken Horn
rooms.description:
You enter a warm tavern. The room is lit mainly by two huge fireplaces at each
end of the room. Small tables and a large bar furnish the room. The
inhabitants of the inn are all minotaurs of varying size and disposition. Most
seem to regard you with suspicion. Few approach you. A large door leads
north, out of the bar and back out into the cold.

rooms.name: The Mahn-Tor Equipment Shop
rooms.description:
You are in a crude equipment shop. The store is filled with racks of various
items that adventurers could use. Large fireplaces light and heat the room.
A large desk occupies the back of the room. The door to the shop lies to the
north.

rooms.name: The Mahn-Tor General Store
rooms.description:
You enter a small store that is dark and cold. Old empty shelves line the
walls and snow blows across the dirty stone floor. It is evident that this
store was once used, but it is no more. A small doorway leads north out into
the chilling snow and wind.

rooms.name: Gorak's Training Room
rooms.description:
This room is full of all sorts of weapons and armours. Pieces of old targets
and practice dummies lie all around. The walls are chipped and scored from
weapon blows. This is obviously the room of an avid warrior. A red door leads
east.

extra_descriptions.description: It looks like it leads back to the hall.

rooms.name: Darkoth's Dark Study
rooms.description:
This room is dark. It reeks of death and evil. Arcane symbols and a small
altar fill the room. Blood runs from the altar. It is evident that this room
is used for unholy purposes. A black door leads east.

extra_descriptions.description: It looks like it leads back to the hall.

rooms.name: Tyrgoth's Inner Sanctum
rooms.description:
Idols to the gods of good fill the room. White furniture and decorations give
the room a holy appearance. It is evident that some being of supreme goodness
lives here. A white door leads east.

extra_descriptions.description: It looks like it leads out to the hall.

rooms.name: The road to the Keep of Mahn-Tor
rooms.description:
You walk up a steep rocky road. It leads up a steep grade to the east. At the
end of this steep road, you see a huge keep. Snow swirls all about you and you
feel your breath freeze as it leaves your lungs. Blurry lights to the east and
west are all you can see from here.

rooms.name: A small guard house
rooms.description:
You enter a small guard house. A huge fireplace lights and warms the room.
Looking around, you see that the room is fairly well furnished. Thick rugs
and curtains help insulate the room and the beds themselves look quite warm.
A table in the center of the room has the remnants of a card game strewn
across it. A small door leads south.

rooms.name: Before the Keep of Mahn-Tor
rooms.description:
You stand before a huge keep that has been carved into the side of the
mountain. Huge wooden gates before you provide entrance to the keep. It
appears as though the cold here has convinced the guards to seek warmth
inside. You see the lights of the city to the west. You also notice small
guard houses to the north and south.

rooms.name: A small guard house
rooms.description:
You enter a small, but warm, guard house. Deep rugs and thick curtains
insulate the room. A huge fireplace lights and warms the room. Outside, you
hear the roar of the freezing wind. A small door leads north out into the cold.

rooms.name: The entryway to the Keep of Mahn-Tor
rooms.description:
You are at the entry hall to the huge keep. The high vaulted ceiling is carved
from solid stone. Huge stone pillars rise up from the floor to meet the
ceiling far above. The architecture appears to be dwarven. A huge pair of
gates stand to the west, protecting the keep from the harsh cold outside. A
large hall leads east, deeper into the keep.

rooms.name: The Hall
rooms.description:
You are in a huge hall. Large tapestries line the walls and huge statues of
various make and appearance are spread about. The ceiling above supports huge
candelabras, which light the room. To the east, you see a bright light and
hear sounds of inhabitation. Looking west, you see the entry gates to the keep.

rooms.name: The Grand Hall
rooms.description:
You are in the main hall of the Keep of Mahn-Tor. This hall is huge. The wide
floor of the hall is an expanse of marble. It shimmers in the light thrown
off by the torches that line the walls. To the east, you see what appears to
be a huge golden throne. The hall itself stretches south and a smaller hall
leads to the west.

rooms.name: The Great Hall
rooms.description:
You stand in the great hall of the keep. Huge pillars rise up to the vaulted
ceiling and torch light glimmers off the marble floor here. You are amazed at
the sheer size of the hall. The hall itself leads north and east. You notice a
smaller hall leading south, deeper into the keep.

rooms.name: Standing before the throne
rooms.description:
You stand before the throne of Mahn-Tor. This golden throne is so huge that it
takes up almost the entire wall, stretching far above the floor. Sitting upon
it, you feel small and feeble. It is evident that this throne is more of a
decoration than anything else. Only the largest of kings could sit upon it.
The hall leads south and west into other parts of the keep.

extra_descriptions.description: The golden throne is huge. It takes up the whole wall.........

rooms.name: The Great Hall
rooms.description:
You are in a great hall. Huge torches light the room and their light shimmers
off the marble floor below you. To the north, you see a huge golden throne.
Looking up, you grow dizzy at the height to which the vaulted ceiling rises.
The hall itself leads north and west.

rooms.name: The secret hallway
rooms.description:
You are in a small, torch lit hall. It leads from east to west. A large gold
door is to the west. To the east, you see a heavy stone door.

extra_descriptions.description: A very formidable looking door.
Looks like the back of a secret door of sorts.

rooms.name: Entry to the Royal Chambers
rooms.description:
You are at the entrance to the royal chambers of the keep. A plush shag rug
covers the stone floor. Large candelabras hang from the ceiling, lighting the
room. A huge fireplace warms the room. Beaded doorways lead south and east. A
huge stone door stands in the west wall.

extra_descriptions.description: A huge stone door.......

rooms.name: The Guard Post
rooms.description:
The hall here has been built into a guard post of sorts. It appears as though
it would be quite easy to defend in times of emergency. Obviously, something
important lies beyond. A small hall leads south, while the main hall can be
seen to the north.

rooms.name: The guarded hall
rooms.description:
You walk down a torch lit hallway. It has been carved out of pure stone. It is
very quiet in this hall. You notice rows of colored doors on each wall. To
your east, you see a yellow door. To your west, you see a red door. The hall
itself leads south and north.

extra_descriptions.description: You see a yellow door. It has the name "Sumaron" written on it.
You see a red door. It has the name "Gorak" written on it.

rooms.name: The guarded hall
rooms.description:
You walk down a small, quiet, torch lit hallway. Doors of different colors are
in each wall. To your east, you see a maroon door. To your west, you see a
black door. The hall itself leads north and south.

extra_descriptions.description: You see a maroon door here. It has the name "Amyrok" written on it.
You see a black door. It has the name "Darkoth" inscribed on it.

rooms.name: Sumaron's Sanctum
rooms.description:
You enter a temple of sorts. A small altar is here and relics of many
religions lie around. It is evident that this is the room of a studying cleric.
A yellow door leads west.

extra_descriptions.description: It looks like it leads back to the hall.

rooms.name: Amyrok's Arcane Study
rooms.description:
This room is full of shelves which hold various spell components. The center
of the room is occupied by a huge pentagram. The entire room smells of smoke
and incense. The room is obviously used extensively by a practicing mage. A
maroon door leads west.

extra_descriptions.description: It looks like it leads back to the hall.

rooms.name: The guarded hall
rooms.description:
You walk down a quiet hall. The stone walls here are wet with moisture.
Colored doors can be seen in the walls here. To your east, you see a green
door. To your west, you see a white door. The hall itself leads north and
south.

extra_descriptions.description: You see a green door here. It has the name "Nasturn" written on it.
You see a white door here. It has the name "Tyrgoth" inscribed on it.

rooms.name: The Harem Room
rooms.description:
This appears to be the harem room of the Keep. Huge piles of furs and beds
fill the room. The lighting is dim, but the room is very warm. You can hear
music playing quietly from somewhere. Beaded doorways lead north and east.

rooms.name: Nasturn's Humble Abode
rooms.description:
This room is filled with all types of natural items. Trees and plants have
been lovingly cultivated and grown by hand, in large pots. The room is like an
indoor garden. A green door leads west.

extra_descriptions.description: It looks like it leads back to the hall.

rooms.name: The main living room
rooms.description:
This room is decorated with sturdy stone furniture that is carved and gilded.
Large candles light the room. A thick rug covers the floor. Thick furs and
tapestries decorate the walls. Beaded doorways lead south and west.

rooms.name: The Master Bedroom
rooms.description:
This appears to be the master bedroom. A huge bed fills the rooms. Piles of
furs and other rich furnishings adorn the room. Candles are everywhere and
they help a huge fireplace light the room. The lavishness of the room
overwhelms you. Beaded doorways lead north and west.

rooms.name: The end of the guarded hall
rooms.description:
You are at the end of the hall. Colored doors line the walls to the north. To
your west, you see a brown door. To your east, you see a grey door. The hall
itself leads north back along the rows of doors.

extra_descriptions.description: You see a grey door here. It has the name "Dorgar" written on it.
You see a brown door here. It has the name "Belrak" written on it.

rooms.name: Dorgar's Dismal Domicile
rooms.description:
This room is dirty and unkempt. Odds and ends of different items lie all over.
It is apparent that some type of pack-rat lives here. It appears as though
nothing has ever entered this room and ever left again. A grey door leads west.

extra_descriptions.description: It looks like it leads back to the hall.

rooms.name: Belrak's Green Room
rooms.description:
This room is full of green. The furniture and all other items show the color
of nature. The room smells of pine and forest odors. From the items here, it
appears as though a woodsman of some sorts lives here. A brown door leads east.

extra_descriptions.description: It looks like it leads to the hall.
